scripts.install-layer: export HUSKY=0 && copyfiles -f ./package.json ./layer/nodejs/ &&  cd ./layer/nodejs && npm i --production
scripts.deploy:layer:production: export DEPLOY=layer AWS_PROFILE=ripiene && npm run install-layer && NODE_ENV=production serverless deploy --aws-profile ripiene --env production --stage prod --force
scripts.deploy:layer:staging: export DEPLOY=layer AWS_PROFILE=ripiene && npm run install-layer && NODE_ENV=stage serverless deploy --aws-profile ripiene --env stage --stage dev --force
scripts.deploy:production: export DEPLOY=functions AWS_PROFILE=ripiene && NODE_ENV=production serverless deploy --aws-profile ripiene --env production --stage prod --force
scripts.deploy:staging: export DEPLOY=functions AWS_PROFILE=ripiene &&  NODE_ENV=stage serverless deploy --aws-profile ripiene --env stage --stage dev --force
